attributes.action: Modify This Website to Allow Votes and Views Against Petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that some proposals submitted to this site will not work and some if implemented would be damaging.  I think that we should be able to vote against petition proposals and even submit our objections.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
